duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, and develop goals and procedures for the library unit, representing the unit to administrators, outside agencies, and other relevant entities.
Supervise subordinate staff, participate in reference activities, and coordinate student EBM library training sessions.
Teach evidence-based medicine library skills and advocacy in scholarly communication literacy for both faculty and students.
Maintain and enhance LibGuides content, compile monthly statistics on reference interactions, and advise departmental goals, policies, and procedures.
Serve on library and HSC committees, contribute to the knowledge base of the profession, and accept other duties and assignments as directed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree plus three years supervisory experience; OR a combination of education and/or supervisory experience to equal seven years. Preferred: MLS/MLIS from an ALA-accredited institution, and experience in searching health and biomedical sciences related databases/websites.
